data.convo: Ange , can your dog do any tricks yet ? Oh , yeah ! He can sit down , roll over , and even play dead . Really ? Does he chase balls ? Yup.Hey , do you want to see a picture ? See , he's eating lunch . This can't be the same dog . He's so clean , he shines . See , he's wagging his tail . He's really cute . His bowl even has his name on it .
